title: Important Update: Income-tax Act, 2025 Applicability for CA Exams from May 2027
content:
# Important Update: Income-tax Act, 2025 Applicability for CA Exams from May 2027

Ek important update hai. The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne Income-tax Act, 2025 ki applicability ko lekar ek announcement kiya hai, especially for students appearing in the upcoming CA examinations.

Hereâ€™s a quick summary of the key points:

*   **The New Act:** The Income-tax Act, 2025, received Presidential assent on August 21, 2025.
*   **Effective Date of Act:** This new legislation is set to come into effect from April 1, 2026, governing the financial year 2026-27.
*   **Applicability for CA Exams:** It has been officially announced that the provisions of the Income-tax Act, 2025 will be applicable for CA examinations from **May 2027 onwards**.
*   **Affected Exam Levels and Papers:**
    *   **CA Intermediate:** Paper 3A: Income-tax Law will be examined under the newly enacted Act.
    *   **CA Final:** Paper 4: Direct Tax Laws & International Taxation will adopt the new Act for its entire tax component.
    *   **Self-Paced Online Modules:** Candidates taking Set C - Paper 5: International Taxation on or after May 1, 2027, will also be required to study and apply the provisions of the updated Income-tax Act.

Students preparing for these examinations should take note of these crucial applicability dates to ensure they study the most updated legal provisions.
